typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		medallion as string,
		{ hack_license} as string,
		{ vendor_id} as string,
		{ pickup_datetime} as string,
		{ payment_type} as string,
		{ fare_amount} as string,
		{ surcharge} as string,
		{ mta_tax} as string,
		{ tip_amount} as string,
		{ tolls_amount} as string,
		{ total_amount} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(each(match(true()), $$ = trim($$))) ~> Trim
Trim sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['trip_fares.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
